text: The Japan national football team is the national football team of Japan. == Most appearances == # Player Caps Goals Career 1 Yasuhito Endō 152 15 2002–2015 2 Masami Ihara 122 5 1988–1999 3 Yoshikatsu Kawaguchi 116 0 1997–2010 Yuto Nagatomo 3 2008– Shinji Okazaki 50 2008– 6 Makoto Hasebe 114 2 2006–2018 7 Yuji Nakazawa 110 17 1999–2010 8 Shunsuke Nakamura 98 24 2000–2010 Keisuke Honda 37 2008– 10 Shinji Kagawa 95 31 2008– Maya Yoshida 10 2010– == Top scorers == #
